page.title: 08A DAY IN MY LIFE
page.content: I get out of bed at 7.45 am. I wash get changed and go down for breakfast,which consists of buttered toast and coffee.I catch our bus and it takes us to school.My school day begins at 9.00am with assembly.Then I have two periods .Then I have break.It lasts for 20 minutes. I go to the canteen and buy a bag of crisps.Then there are two other periods.I have a school lunch which consists of chips, roast brisket and custard.At 2.00 pm I have another two periods and school finishes at 3.45 pm.I arrive home at 4.15 pm.Then I get my tea and catch the bus to the football.Aberdeen are playing Celtic. The final score was 3-1 Aberdeen.I catch the bus home and go to bed.
